title: London riots / UK riots: verified areas
name: London riots / UK riots: verified areas
description:
Affected areas (since Saturday but mostly Monday night), with sources where appropriate.

Missing info? Tweet @jamescridland with verifiable source please // http://james.cridland.net/+

http://james.cridland.net/blog/mapping-the-riots/

In London? Please follow @riotcleanup

properties.name: Tottenham
properties.description: Saturday 6 August

properties.name: Enfield
properties.description: Police are called to High Street Enfield after reports shop windows are being smashed. A police vehicle is damaged.18:28 Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Chingford Mount
properties.description: Three officers are injured after being hit by a vehicle in Chingford Mount, Waltham Forest. The officers had been making arrests after a shop was looted. Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Brixton
properties.description: Up to 200 youths looted shops and charged police in Coldharbour Lane and the High Street, Sunday 8 August

properties.name: Oxford Circus
properties.description: Fifty youths gathered in Oxford Circus, central London, and threw objects at shops: Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Walthamstow
properties.description: More than 30 youths vandalised and looted shops: Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Waltham Forest
properties.description: Gangs of youths attack officers and shops are targeted. Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Ponder's End
properties.description: A Tesco store in Ponders End was attacked and items stolen: Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Chelsea
properties.description: Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Islington
properties.description: A police vehicle windscreen was smashed during a disturbance in Islington: Sunday 7 August

properties.name: Hackney
properties.description: Monday 8 August 2011http://www.viceland.com/wp/2011/08/the-battle-of-mare-street/

properties.name: Peckham
properties.description: Vehicles set on fire, Monday 8 August

properties.name: Lewisham
properties.description: Vehicles set on fire and shops lootedBBC News Channel 20:48 Mon 8 Aug  Photoshttp://www.flickr.com/photos/tomroyal/sets/72157627391514174/8:35 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Camberwell
properties.description: Looters/rioters moments ago causing chaos along the Walworth road, Camberwell - Monday 8 Augusthttps://twitter.com/psythor/status/100631547559940096

properties.name: Deptford
properties.description: Reports of Deptford violence. Daily Telegraph reporting fires.19:40 Mon 8 August

properties.name: Birmingham
properties.description: "Several premises attacked in centre" (West Midlands Police) Source: BBC Newshttp://birminghamriots2011.tumblr.com/20:06 Monday 8 Aug

properties.name: Croydon
properties.description: Swarms of youths in hoods and masks are confronting the police from every junction to London Road. Bricks, bottles and sticks were thrown at the police line, who are armed with batons and riot shields.Source: http://www.yourlocalguardian.co.uk/news/local/topstories/9183466.LIVE__Riot_fallout_hits_Croydon/19:59 Mon 8 AugA bus was set alight as rioters took to the streets.BBC News22:14 Mon 8 AugPolice at the scene of the Croydon disturbances are investigating a "non-fatal" shooting, according to a source.BBC News23:49 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: East Ham
properties.description: Looting reported20:02 BBC News Channel; Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Ilford
properties.description: Mike Gapes, MP: Gang of copycat thug outsiders have gone on rampage in Ilford High Rd and Ilford Lane.http://twitter.com/#!/MikeGapes/status/10064973615504998620:55 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Tooting
properties.description: Vandals shattered the front windows of Ladbrokes, in Franciscan Road, Tooting, and nearby CEX, in Mitcham Road.http://www.yourlocalguardian.co.uk/news/local/wandsworthnews/9184042.Tooting_stores_targeted_in_copycat_riots/Sat 6 August

properties.name: Streatham
properties.description: A group of about 15 masked men broke into a shop at around 2.30am and stole almost £1000 of goods, including laptops and new phones. Looters also targeted a nearby off-licence – S & G Food and News - shortly after 9.30pm.http://www.streathamguardian.co.uk/news/9183937.Streatham_traders_speak_of_riot_drama/Sun 7 Aug

properties.name: Clapham Junction
properties.description: 100 to 200 people involved in a riot in Lavender Hill. Sky News reporter21:15 Mon 8 AugChris Rogers, BBC News Channel21:46 Mon 8 AugDebenhams apparently one of the targets21:52

properties.name: Walworth Road, Camberwell
properties.description: Reported looting on Twitter21:38 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Colliers Wood
properties.description: Multiple reports of shops on fire and looters at Tandem Centrehttps://twitter.com/nandos_official/status/100616881517510656https://twitter.com/tanyth_jones/status/10066891645138534Ey5  Eye-witness:http://www.demotix.com/news/782970/aftermath-looting-colliers-wood-retail-park

properties.name: Corporation St, Birmingham
properties.description: Channel 4 News has spoken to one eyewitness, Omar Siddique, who was leaving work at 8pm, he said trouble was "brewing"."There must have been 20 police vans and 100 uniformed officers on Corporation Street in the city centre."Whole herds of youths were running up and down, but I didn't see anybody throwing missiles."http://www.channel4.com/news/unrest-spreads-to-leeds-and-birmingham

properties.name: Three Sisters pub, Seven Sisters
properties.description: At five lane junction outside the Three Sisters pub a police car just tried to drive down a road blocked by a gang of youths. The windscreen was smashed and pelted with bricks before the driver managed to speed off. Someone screamed that the police car had run a person over but it wasn't the case. Extremely dangerous for any police to go near.http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/blog/2011/aug/08/london-riots-third-night-live20:43 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Woolwich
properties.description: Riot also in Woolwich Town Centre, police car on fire, the bus I took home had rocks thrown at it and a window was smashed.See pics here:http://lockerz.com/s/127849623http://lockerz.com/s/127839338http://lockerz.com/s/127842931http://lockerz.com/s/127849934DIrect from Emanuel22:23 Mon 8 Aughttp://www.blottr.com/crime/breaking-news/woolwich-trashed-looting-gathers-pace23:35 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Loughborough Junction
properties.description: Sam Francis is in Loughborough Junction Brixton, where he witnessed 30 youths, faces covered, being chased into the station by two police officers. Police vans and cars were also in pursuit, and blocked the youths inside the station.http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/blog/2011/aug/08/london-riots-third-night-live22:36 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Barking
properties.description: "Thugs in Hackney, East London, smashed up shop fronts and hurled missiles at riot cops. Similar scenes broke out in Lewisham, Barking and Peckham, where buildings went up in flames with firemen initially unable to reach them." - The Sunhttp://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/3740546/Cops-battle-new-riots-across-London.html?OTC-RSSATTR=News22:38 Mon 8 Aug"it passed the end of my road. I spoke to locals who confirmed damage."https://twitter.com/#!/sbailey2076/status/10068306446372864022:42 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Wood Green
properties.description: Car fires, looters.http://www.biggreenbookshop.com/blog/info_11.htmlSun 7 Aug

properties.name: Notting Hill
properties.description: Multiple reports on Twitterhttps://twitter.com/fjoms/status/100686636127490048https://twitter.com/elliehernaman/status/100685703658221569https://twitter.com/matinastevis/status/100685275000352769https://twitter.com/matinastevis/status/100686986876170240

properties.name: Dalston
properties.description: Bus set on fire."We've detoured to Dalston where a bus was set on fire in shacklewell lane earlier. The single deck bus is now cordoned off and there doesn't seem to be much damage, but the incident has clearly shaken the large Turkish community here. Many shopkeepers are on the street talking about how they chased away the gang of youths behind the bus fire."http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/blog/2011/aug/08/london-riots-third-night-live22:47 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Camden
properties.description: BBCLondonNews: Camden High Street, Chalk Farm Road now closed with reported rioting.https://twitter.com/bbclondonnews/status/10068490324241612823:17 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Ealing Broadway
properties.description: Ealing Broadway now closed with reported rioting.https://twitter.com/bbclondonnews/status/10069077878283878523:21 Mon 8 AugRioting is taking place in Ealing, west London, where the windows of a Tesco supermarket have been put out, a car is on fire and rubbish is strewn in public areas. There is also a fire in Haven Green park, opposite Ealing Broadway Tube.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-1444967523:27 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Camden Town
properties.description: Electric Ballroom in Camden has just been smashed up.https://twitter.com/camdenpubcrawl/status/10068460298895360023:34 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Bromley
properties.description: Unconfirmed reports of Primark and other stores on fire. Stations closed.@bbclondonnews: Bromley High St is closed with repotrs of rioting, according to London Buses.23:47 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Isle of Dogs
properties.description: Fire on Spindrift Avenue, Isle of Dogshttps://twitter.com/ryan0_uk/status/100700804410908672https://twitter.com/sazsmo/status/100700646369542144https://twitter.com/petermalynn/status/100700603717660673https://twitter.com/rsamarsh/status/10070024044059852823:56 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Roman Road
properties.description: Looters break into Zee & Co.https://twitter.com/rebeccaklein11/status/100702915487989760https://twitter.com/sarahrainey4/status/100669609321037824https://twitter.com/craig4589/status/100702418567831552https://twitter.com/smalls87/status/10070086328634572800:00 Tue 9 Aug Eye witnesshttp://trialbyjeory.wordpress.com/2011/08/08/watching-the-looting-in-bow-pictures/00:51 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Harringay Arena
properties.description: Looting and attempted robberyhttp://www.harringayonline.com/forum/topics/midnight-looting-at-arena-last-night00:00 Monday 8 August

properties.name: St John's Hill, Clapham
properties.description: "Police have arrived at St John’s Hill in Clapham and rapidly brought the area under control."http://thewestlondoner.wordpress.com/23:54 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Surrey Quays
properties.description: 2337: Looters are being chased down by police in Surrey Quays.http://thewestlondoner.wordpress.com/23:37 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Fulham Broadway
properties.description: "Cars have been torched in Fulham Broadway."http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html00:01 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: East Dulwich
properties.description: Tom Whitehead, the Daily Telegraph's Home Affairs editor, reports a group of around 30 hooded and masked youths have targeted East Dulwich, smashing windows at a pubm, pharmacy and convinience store.http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html23:41 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Balham
properties.description: Telegraph reporter Emily Gosden says shop windows have been broken and piles of ruibbish set alight in Balham, South London.23:05 Mon 8 August

properties.name: Old Kent Road
properties.description: The BBC reports looting on the Old Kent Road and Tower Bridge areas of London, with Barclays Bank, Tesco, Argos and Curry's targetted by youths on bikes.http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html23:41 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: South Woodford
properties.description: Jeweller and bank broken intohttps://twitter.com/jackamos_/status/10070667601288396900:15 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Romford
properties.description: Debenhams attacked.https://twitter.com/lewisoutten/status/100707567063416832 contains a video.00:24 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Essex Road
properties.description: I've just returned from Hackney riots and was ambushed just off Essex Road and had my bike snatched by a group of six masked teenagers waiting on Ecclesbourne Road who were shouting "take the bike, take the bike".I was forced to swerve away from them but crashed to the ground. Just as one of the thieves grabbed my bike from under me a red van raced screeched around the corner and smashed into a parked car. Two young men then got out and the man in passenger seat then put his hand in his pocket and threatened to pull a on knife on the thieves, accusing them of stealing his bike earlier.http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/blog/2011/aug/08/london-riots-third-night-live23:54 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Hurst St
properties.description: Robbedhttp://birminghamriots2011.tumblr.com/post/8664167356/just-when-things-seemed-to-be-calming-down-djbenm00:24 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Holyhead Road
properties.description: Reports that a police station, said to be the Holyhead Road one in Handsworth has been set ablaze and that this is a picture of it. Things appear to be escalating around the imminent area.http://birminghamriots2011.tumblr.com/post/8663833179/reports-that-a-police-station-said-to-be-the00:16 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Canning Town
properties.description: Riot in canning town earlier, I got some pictures. Went from one end of barking road to the otherhttp://twitpic.com/photos/Georgedecathttps://twitter.com/georgedecat/status/10071206478755840000:39 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Waltham Cross
properties.description: Rioters have smashed their way into a jeweller's and two police cars have been damaged after violence seen in London spread to Hertfordshire.Hertfordshire's police say they received several calls from the public from 9.50pm on Sunday 7 August 2011 to reports of groups of youths in Waltham Cross and Cheshunt.  Officers in high visibility clothing were deployed to the area.http://www.heart.co.uk/dunstable/news/local/riots-spread-hertfordshire/21:50 Sun 7 August

properties.name: Blackheath
properties.description: Blackheath been got. Designer clothes shop Rogue smashed uphttp://yfrog.com/gzejltcljhttps://twitter.com/josscrowley/status/10071325245086105700:44 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Lee
properties.description: Twitter reports: A Wetherspoons in Lee has been targetted in a "mass mugging." Police were rung but did not pick up.http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html00:46 Tue 9 AugAJRyland: @JamesCridland Wetherspoons being mugged in Lee http://j.mp/mVzHTw (also confirmed by managers on phone).https://twitter.com/ajryland/status/100712992517275650

properties.name: Toxteth
properties.description: http://yfrog.com/h75jygfjGranada Reports00:49 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Harlesden
properties.description: Workers at Best Buy on Harlesden High Street fought off attempts to enter their shop from a gang of around 20 thieves, alleged to be aged 13-26, carrying bits of wood from nearby shop fronts and stolen wooden mops.http://www.wbtimes.co.uk/news/harlesden_traders_attacked_as_looters_attempt_to_storm_their_shops_1_98826100:54 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Portobello Road
properties.description: Patrick Wetergreen, a BBC IT technician, tells us he saw looters on Portabello Road, which is near his west London home. He says several car windows on the street were smashed, a moped was on fire and he saw about 50 people, the majority of whom had covered their faces.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-1444967500:49 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Peckham High Street
properties.description: BBC London says there is criminal activity on the A202 Peckham High Street, which is blocked near Rye Lane - with shops being smashed and buses attacked.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-1444967518:16 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Bethnal Green Road
properties.description: Road riot late afternoon, Monday 8 Aughttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OM85NQ_5PY&feature=youtu.be

properties.name: Peckham
properties.description: Just watching a group of teenagers ransack Iceland in Peckham. They're running in and out with armfuls of food and drink. Not a policeman in sight. Someone on the street is yelling "make sure you get Frebreze".http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html20:56 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: Enfield Lock
properties.description: http://yfrog.com/mdi5gzThere are reports of a fire at the Sony warehouse in Enfield, north London.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-1444967500:54 Tue 9 AugThe Sony warehouse centre at 6 Solar Way,Enfield, is the only UK centre for 'Sony DADC' and a large section of the UK's digital media is stored there.Tommy Thomson, a witness, tells BBC news he saw 20 male youths coming out the smashed doors of building, carrying consoles. One punched him before driving off. He returned to his Premier Inn hotel workplace. Five minutes later he saw the blaze rip through the warehouse. He helped evacuate guests from the hotel. He says he does not know if there was anyone in the building but many workers have evening shifts.http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html

properties.name: Ealing Broadway
properties.description: Tesco Express lootedSky News01:20 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Camberwell Green
properties.description: Witness David Francis reports rioting in Camberwell Green, South London. He says he was punched in the face by "what felt like very reals pearls wrapped around a masked rioters' fist."http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/crime/8687177/London-riots-live.html01:18 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: West Ealing
properties.description: "John Skinner from West Ealing writes "Young people were dragging boxed flat screen TV's in their hands with impunity. I saw a convoy of police cars driving past. The officers were clearly stretched. No cars stopped. I also saw Seba Electronics being ransacked; two or three TV's were stolen by one person. His audacity brought gasps from onlookers. I feel awful for the owner and his wife who are always pleasant and helpful and have had their business there for years. They do not deserve what has happened. Carphone Warehouse is engulfed by plumes of smoke. Wilkinsons, Boots, Cash Converters and other stores in the area were also attacked."BBC News05:40 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: The Ledbury, Notting Hill
properties.description: "The restaurant staff was yelling at us to get away from the windows.  Before I knew it, the front door, a solid piece of glass shattered and people came crashing in with hoodies, masks, and random weapons."http://www.runawaysquirrels.com/2011/08/london-riots-comes-to-the-ledbury/21:00 Mon 8 Aug

properties.name: St Annes Nottingham
properties.description: About 40 vehicles were set on fire in a night of violence in Nottingham described by one senior officer as "motivated" by the London riots.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-nottinghamshire-1445558423:30 Monday 8 Aug

properties.name: Victoria Centre, Nottingham
properties.description: Police foiled an attempt to break into the Victoria Centre in the city centre. Police said the trouble began when a group of about 30 people threw missiles at a marked police car in Abbotsford Drive in St Ann's.Officers said the group then went to the city centre and tried to break into JD Sports in the Victoria Centre.http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-nottinghamshire-1445558400:01 Tue 9 Aug

properties.name: Bristol
properties.description: A group of about 20 youths, who had their faces covered by balaclavas and masks, had gathered initially on Dean Street where a stand-off with police took place.Police then went through Bishop Street to Little Bishop Street where the first major confrontation took place outside the Jamaica Inn. Stones and bottles rained down on officers as they charged and then retreated to force the group, joined by another 20 or 30 masked youths, back. Car windows were smashed, while wheelie bins were set alight in the middle of the streets.http://www.thisisbristol.co.uk/Bristol-riots-eye-witness-report/story-13096551-detail/story.html00:01 Tues 9 Aug

properties.name: Barnsbury Road
properties.description: Micycle looted.Video from ownerhttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2jrPG6Uypbk&feature=player_embeddedMon 8 Aug

properties.name: Crystal Palace
properties.description: Following an attack on the Blockbuster Video store, in Westow Street, about 20 locals decided they would protect the road.A gang of about five youths had been hanging around looking for opportunities to steal and loot.http://www.streathamguardian.co.uk/news/9184259.Crystal_Palace_residents_take_a_stand_against_looters/01:07 Tuesday 9 Aug
